H0.text: The Tripitaka is a collection of whose religious teachings. Jesus

H1.text: The Tripitaka is a collection of whose religious teachings. Muhammad

H2.text: The Tripitaka is a collection of whose religious teachings. Krishna

H3.text: The Tripitaka is a collection of whose religious teachings. Phật

A4.text: His teachings were compiled by the Buddhist community into the Vinaya Piṭaka, containing codes for monastic discipline, and the Sūtra Piṭaka, a collection of discourses attributed to him.
